verses.text: \w Be|strong="H6440"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, God, \w be|strong="H6440"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul takes refuge \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. Yes, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* wings, \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* take refuge, until disaster \w has|strong="H7586"\w* passed.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* cry \w out|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* God Most High, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* God \w who|strong="H5315"\w* accomplishes \w my|strong="H3588"\w* requests \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7121"\w* send \w from|strong="H5921"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H7121"\w* save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* rebukes \w the|strong="H5921"\w* one \w who|strong="H7121"\w* is pursuing \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs* God \w will|strong="H7121"\w* send \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* loving kindness \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* truth.

\w My|strong="H7971"\w* soul \w is|strong="H2617"\w* amongst lions. \w I|strong="H7971"\w* lie amongst \w those|strong="H3467"\w* \w who|strong="H3467"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w set|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* fire, even \w the|strong="H7971"\w* sons \w of|strong="H8064"\w* men, whose teeth \w are|strong="H8064"\w* spears \w and|strong="H7971"\w* arrows, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* tongue \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sharp sword.

\w Be|strong="H1121"\w* exalted, God, above \w the|strong="H8432"\w* heavens! \w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H7901"\w* glory \w be|strong="H1121"\w* above \w all|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* earth!

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* prepared \w a|strong="H3068"\w* net \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* steps. \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H3519"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* bowed \w down|strong="H5921"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* dig \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* fall \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* middle \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w My|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3559"\w*, God. \w My|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3559"\w*. \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* sing, yes, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* sing praises.
Wake up, \w my|strong="H3559"\w* glory! Wake up, lute \w and|strong="H3820"\w* harp! \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* wake up \w the|strong="H3559"\w* dawn.

\w I|strong="H5782"\w* \w will|strong="H3519"\w* give thanks \w to|strong="H3519"\w* you, Lord, amongst \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples. \w I|strong="H5782"\w* \w will|strong="H3519"\w* sing praises \w to|strong="H3519"\w* you amongst \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations.

\w For|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3034"\w* great loving kindness reaches \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3034"\w* truth \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* skies.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* exalted, \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, above \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*. Let \w your|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w be|strong="H8064"\w* \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.
